714362f-a.title: Manhattan: 72nd Street - 2nd Avenue
714362f-a.text:
A rear view of 72nd Street, south side, between Third and
Second Aves., also showing a large apartment house on the north
side of 72nd Street, between Third and Second Aves,, seen over
the roofs of 72nd Street.
June 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

707915f-a.title: Manhattan: 2nd Avenue - 72nd Street (East)
707915f-a.text:
Second Ave., east side, north from East 72nd Street, showing the push-
cart market, which occupies this section of the Aveuue. Note the display of
wares on the sidewalk, in front of the stores.
December 28, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

707913f-b.title: Manhattan: 2nd Avenue - 72nd Street (East)
707913f-b.text:

Views 1,2

714360f-b.title: Manhattan: 72nd Street (East) - 2nd Avenue
714360f-b.text:
252-254 East 72nd Street, adjoining the S.W. corner of Second
Avenue. This building is the Church of St. John the Martyr 0ioman
Catholic).

P. L. Sperr.
(2)

Note the crosstown bus in the foreground.
August 5, 1938
